clinical_study.brief_title: Study Of Airway Physiology In Adults. SERETIDE DISKUS速 Inhaler and FLIXOTIDE速 Inhaler Are Trademarks of GSK Croup of Companies.
clinical_study.official_title: Randomised, Double Blind, Parallel Group Study to Assess the Bronchodilative and Bronchoprotective Properties of SERETIDE DISKUS速 Inhaler 50/100 mcg Twice Daily vs FLIXOTIDE速 Inhaler 200 mcg Twice Daily

brief_summary.textblock: Comparison of two asthma treatments by lung function measures.

detailed_description.textblock: Single centre, randomised, double-blind, comparator study to demonstrate superiority of salmeterol/fluticasone propionate combination product 50/100mcg bd over fluticasone propionate 100mcg bd with respect to improvements in airway physiology (sRAW) in adults with persistent asthma treated for 4 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Specific airway resistance (sRAW kPa.L.s) measured before the study medication dose at the end of treatment (week 4)

secondary_outcome.measure: sRAW measured post-dose at Week 2 and week 4. % symptom-free days over Weeks 1-4. % symptom-free nights over Weeks 1-4. Type and frequency of adverse events.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion:
- Physician documented diagnosis of asthma which has been present for at least 6 months.
- Receiving a total daily dose of 200-500mcg/day beclomethasone dipropionate or equivalent for at least 4 weeks prior to the start of the run-in period.
Exclusion:
- Has had 3 or more courses of oral corticosteroids in the 12 months previous to visit 1
